snippet.title: Small Kingdoms Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and real-time strategy game, the Small Kingdoms Prologue is a free introductory version to the full game with a single campaign and a smaller number of buildings and units

Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rival as you build up your cities and armies on the world map and command your troops on the battlefield

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2533000/Small_Kingdoms/
